languages.text: "Кровь моей расы холодна, мы любим теплые гнезда. Среди моих ребят нет смекалистого техника, если сможешь починить конвектор — я смилуюсь над тобой". {n}Злоба самодовольно и с издевкой взирает на вас.{/n}

"My race is cold-blooded. We like our nests warm. None of my gang have a knack for hardware, so if you can fix the convector, I'll take pity on you." {n}Smug and mocking, Malice stares at you unblinkingly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Кровь моей расы холодна, мы любим теплые гнезда. Среди моих ребят нет смекалистого техника, если сможешь починить конвектор — я смилуюсь над тобой". {n}Злоба самодовольно и с издевкой взирает на вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "My race is cold-blooded. We like our nests warm. None of my gang have a knack for hardware, so if you can fix the convector, I'll take pity on you." {n}Smug and mocking, Malice stares at you unblinkingly.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "My race is cold-blooded. We like our nests warm. None of my gang have a knack for hardware, so if you can fix the convector, I'll take pity on you." {n}Smug and mocking, Malice stares at you unblinkingly.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: “我的种族是冷血种族，我们喜欢让巢穴保持温暖，但我手下这群人对硬件一窍不通。如果你能修好我的对流加热器，我会怜悯你的。”{n}恶棍眼睛一眨不眨地看着你，目光中充满傲慢与嘲笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My race is cold-blooded. We like our nests warm. None of my gang have a knack for hardware, so if you can fix the convector, I'll take pity on you." {n}Smug and mocking, Malice stares at you unblinkingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我的种族是冷血种族，我们喜欢让巢穴保持温暖，但我手下这群人对硬件一窍不通。如果你能修好我的对流加热器，我会怜悯你的。”{n}恶棍眼睛一眨不眨地看着你，目光中充满傲慢与嘲笑。{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: «Mi raza es de sangre fría. Nos gusta que nuestros nidos estén calientes. Nadie en mi banda tiene talento para la maquinaria, así que si arreglas el convector me apiadaré de ti». {n}Burlón y arrogante, Malicia te mira sin pestañear.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My race is cold-blooded. We like our nests warm. None of my gang have a knack for hardware, so if you can fix the convector, I'll take pity on you." {n}Smug and mocking, Malice stares at you unblinkingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mi raza es de sangre fría. Nos gusta que nuestros nidos estén calientes. Nadie en mi banda tiene talento para la maquinaria, así que si arreglas el convector me apiadaré de ti». {n}Burlón y arrogante, Malicia te mira sin pestañear.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: 「我々の種族は変温性だ。温かい住まいにいるのを好む。仲間は誰も機械類をいじれないので、温度調整器を修理してくれたら温情をかけてやろう」{n}笑顔を浮かべながら嘲るように、マリスはまばたきもせずにこちらを見つめてきた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My race is cold-blooded. We like our nests warm. None of my gang have a knack for hardware, so if you can fix the convector, I'll take pity on you." {n}Smug and mocking, Malice stares at you unblinkingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我々の種族は変温性だ。温かい住まいにいるのを好む。仲間は誰も機械類をいじれないので、温度調整器を修理してくれたら温情をかけてやろう」{n}笑顔を浮かべながら嘲るように、マリスはまばたきもせずにこちらを見つめてきた。{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Mein Volk ist kaltblütig. Wir mögen unsere Nester warm. Niemand aus meiner Bande ist technisch begabt, wenn Ihr den Konvektor also reparieren könnt, lasse ich Gnade walten." {n}Tücke starrt dich überheblich und spöttisch an, ohne zu blinzeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My race is cold-blooded. We like our nests warm. None of my gang have a knack for hardware, so if you can fix the convector, I'll take pity on you." {n}Smug and mocking, Malice stares at you unblinkingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Mein Volk ist kaltblütig. Wir mögen unsere Nester warm. Niemand aus meiner Bande ist technisch begabt, wenn Ihr den Konvektor also reparieren könnt, lasse ich Gnade walten." {n}Tücke starrt dich überheblich und spöttisch an, ohne zu blinzeln.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: « Je suis d'une espèce à sang froid. Nous aimons que nos nids soient chauds. Personne dans ma bande ne s'y connaît en bricolage, alors si vous réparez le convecteur, je vous prendrai peut-être en pitié, » {n}déclare Démon sur un ton suffisant et moqueur, tout en vous observant sans cligner des yeux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My race is cold-blooded. We like our nests warm. None of my gang have a knack for hardware, so if you can fix the convector, I'll take pity on you." {n}Smug and mocking, Malice stares at you unblinkingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je suis d'une espèce à sang froid. Nous aimons que nos nids soient chauds. Personne dans ma bande ne s'y connaît en bricolage, alors si vous réparez le convecteur, je vous prendrai peut-être en pitié, » {n}déclare Démon sur un ton suffisant et moqueur, tout en vous observant sans cligner des yeux.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Irkım soğukkanlıdır. Yuvalarımızın sıcak olmasını severiz. Çetemde kimse alet edevattan anlamıyor. Bağlayıcıyı onarabilirsen sana merhamet ederim." {n}Melanet, kendini beğenmiş ve alaycı bir tavırla, göz kırpmadan sana bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My race is cold-blooded. We like our nests warm. None of my gang have a knack for hardware, so if you can fix the convector, I'll take pity on you." {n}Smug and mocking, Malice stares at you unblinkingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Benim ırkım soğukkanlıdır. Yuvalarımızın sıcak olmasını severiz. Çetemde kimse alet edevattan anlamıyor. Bağlayıcıyı onarabilirsen merhamet göstereceğim." {n}Melanet, kendini beğenmiş ve alaycı bir tavırla göz kırpmadan sana bakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger
